title: Jay Preston Barnes
text:
Jay Preston Barnes (August 9, 1869 – May 8, 1943) was an American <a href="politician">politician</a> who served as <a href="List%20of%20mayors%20of%20Pittsfield%2C%20Massachusetts">Mayor</a> of <a href="Pittsfield%2C%20Massachusetts">Pittsfield, Massachusetts</a>.
Family life.
On October 25, 1894 Barnes married Mary Henrietta Dutton, the daughter of John and Henrietta M. (Tuthill) Dutton, they had a son, Harold Dutton Barnes, born on September 28, 1895.
